name: ARIW YANATF
description:
A game where you have to survive without fighting with enemies. Why? Because you can't! You are just a boy! On an alien spaceship!

The game is basically a demo featuring 6 levels, but instead of polish and looks I decided to go for mechanics. I fit as many of them and their combinations as I could think of.

Thank you for possibly downloading it and, please, enjoy it!
Made for GMTK GameJam 2018
